pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp'-Based Helper Functions to Pass 'Int64' and 'nanotime' Values Between 'R' and 'C++' // 'Int64' values can be created and accessed via the 'bit64' package and its 'integer64' class which package the 'int64' representation cleverly into a 'double'. The 'nanotime' packages builds on this to support nanosecond-resolution timestamps. This packages helps conversions between 'R' and 'C++' via several helper functions provided via a single header file. A complete example client package is included as an illustration.
